title: Walking in Supernatural Healing Power
description: “Chris Gore is a powerfully anointed minister of healing. In his book, truth and testimony are blended in an exciting, entertaining, educating way.” – Randy Clark , author of There is More and founder of Global Awakening Walking in God’s healing power is easier than you imagined. Have you ever imagined, I believe God heals people. But healing ministry? That’s for…someone on a platform? Someone who is super spiritual? Someone who has their act together In Walking in Supernatural Healing Power , Chris Gore demystifies God’s supernatural power, showing how you can be effectively trained, equipped, and activated into a lifestyle of walking in healing and miracles. Get ready
author: Chris Gore
